info.title: Cheqd - gRPC Gateway docs
info.description: A REST interface for state queries

get.description: This endpoint queries the DID Doc and Metadata for a given DID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: is a DID to be fetched

get.summary: Query metadata for all versions of a DID
get.description: This endpoint queries the Metadata for all the versions of a DID

get.summary: Query specific version of DID Document
get.description: This endpoint takes DID and the versionId as input and returns the specific version of the DID Document

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: is a unique value that maps DID Doc state at some point

get.description: This endpoint takes collectionId as input and returns collection resource metadata for the given collection id

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: is unique identifier a for collection

get.description: This endpoint takes collectionId and resource identifier as input and returns the Resource with Metadata

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: is unique identifier a for collection

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: is unique identifier for a resource

get.description: This endpoint takes collectionId and resource identifier as input and returns the Resource Metadata

parameters.name: collection_id
parameters.description: is unique identifier a for collection

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: is unique identifier for a resource
